Masser en mouvements circulaires jusqu' ce que le produit recouvre votre visage d une fine couche uniforme, tout en vitant le contour des yeux et de la bouche. If it accidentally gets into your eyes, rinse with plenty of water to remove it immediately. This is a disposable product. Once unpacking, please use it as soon as you can. Do not use it when the package or product is damaged. If there s a rash or other skin problem after you use this product, rinse with plenty of water to remove it. warnings.text: This product is for external use only. Store in a cool place and keep it out of reach of children. Please use it with caution especially for sensitive skin. For those who use it for the first time or for sensitive skin, please try it on the partial skin first. Make sure that there is no allergic reaction before using it on the whole face. Do not use on the damage skin, such as wounds, redness, sunburn, eczema, etc. and please keep it out your eyes. If it accidentally gets into your eyes, rinse with plenty of water to remove it immediately. This is a disposable product. Once unpacking, please use it as soon as you can. Do not use it when the package or product is damaged. If there s a rash or other skin problem after you use this product, rinse with plenty of water to remove it. If your body condition is still severe, get medical help or contact a dermatologist immediately.

To remove eye makeup, pump a small amount onto a moist cloth and gently wipe makeup away.

Liquid Facelift® Usage Guide

We are thrilled for you to start your Liquid Facelift® journey! It's very important to follow these instructions. Liquid Facelift® is a premium potent blend of peptides that must be used very carefully especially for first timers. Follow these instructions for BEST RESULTS.

1. Begin with a thoroughly cleaned and dry face. Avoid other products or chemicals before applying Liquid Facelift®.

2. Gently massage one pearl size amount of Liquid Facelift® into face and neck every other day, gradually increasing to daily use as your skin adjusts.

3. If sensitivity occurs, lessen use frequency and/or dosage until the skin adjusts. If sensitivity persists, cease use, and consult with a physician.

warnings.text: 1. For nose strip; use only on the nose. 2. For face strip; avoid using around the eyes. 3. Avoid using on acne blemishes or swollen, sunburned, excessively dry skin, or skin prone to spider veins. 4. Consult a physician before using on skin being treated with prescription acne medication. 5. Avoid using on skin which is sensitive to bandages or peel-off face masks. 6. Remove strip as directed promptly after it becomes stiff. If strip is difficult or painful to remove, wet strip thoroughly until it slides off easily. Forceful removal of the strip should be avoided and may cause skin abrasions. If this occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. 7. Do not use more often than once every three days on nose or same area of the face.

For Eyelashes - Dip a clean mascara brush in the oil and brush on lashes or use a clean brush applicator to apply along the lash line before bed. For Eyebrows - Use a clean finger or clean mascara brush to apply the oil to eyebrows. Apply nightly before bed. For Skin - Use at full strength as a carrier oil, dilute in another carrier oil, or as an ingredient in aromatherapy projects.

directions.text: Gentle enough for daily use. Can be used in AM and PM, however if only using once per day we recommend AM. On cleansed skin apply a pea-sized amount to face and neck after cleansing and Hyaluronic Acid if you are using. If you would like to use other skin care products on top, wait around 10 minutes before using them. You can apply it one of two ways:

1. Mix the booster with our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Daily Defense Face Moisturizer, Resurfacing Anti Aging Cream or Revitalizing Anti Aging Cream and apply directly to your face and neck, using about 6-8 drops of the booster per ounce of the cream you are mixing it with.

2. Alternatively, you can apply a pea size amount (1-2 drops) of the booster directly onto your entire face. Make sure to cover the entire face down into the neck. Follow with a light application of our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men or Revitalizing Anti Aging Cream.

title: Aztec Secret Indian Healing Clay  (2019 formulation)

ingredients.text: Calcium Bentonite (Green) Clay

directions.text: Mix aztec secert indian healing clay with equal parts of apple cider vinegar or water.its best to use a glass, pottery or wooden bowl. Stir the mixture until is a smooth paste-add more clay or liquid as needed. Apply a 1/8 inch to 1/4 inch thick layer of clay to the face or other areas and let it dry. Drying times vary, but times are generally 5 minutes of delicate skin and 15-20 minutes for normal skin. You will feel a pulling and tightening sensation, deep pore cleansing! Remove clay by washing with warm water. A slight redness may appear after removing the clay. This is normal and will disappear in approximately 30 minutes. Helps to remove dirt and impurities from the pores of the skin. The clay is beneficial for deep pore cleansing of the skin.

directions.text:
Cleanse skin thoroughly before applying a generous layer of Sulfur Clay Mask to the entire face, avoiding the eye area. Wait 15 minutes before washing thoroughly. 

Using a damp cloth, gently wipe away the mask residue, then rinse with warm water to remove all traces. Follow with toner, corrective serum, and moisturizer if desired.

New users should perform a sensitivity test by applying product to a small affected area or to inside of wrist during. If no discomfort occurs within three days, proceed with normal usage. 

Do not use on broken skin or apply to large areas of the body.

warnings.text: . FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY. DO NOT USE. ? on broken skin. ? on large areas of the body. ? if you have very sensitive skin or if you are sensitive to benzoyl peroxide. If this occurs, only one medication should be used unless directed by a doctor. ? keep away from eyes, lips, mouth, and sensitive areas of the neck. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
